title: Most affordable Harley-Davidson: New Harley X440 launched at starting price of Rs 2,29,000
description: It is the most affordable, entry-level motorcycle from Harley-Davidson, which has been jointly developed by Harley-Davidson and Hero MotoCorp, and the latter will manufacture it locally in India.
